metadata.synopsis: Jaheira COM. Conversation with Jaheira's Son. With him being a druid like her, they can afford to be a bit on the nose with their woes - and her son can be young enough that Timeless Body seems a good idea. Player intervention can change this.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Jaheira's house- Talk to Jaheira's Sonlarian://bookmark?name=CTY_JaheirasHouse&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-198.180267;36.128036;-47.551403&camTarget=-198.939575;35.720970;-47.043709

2.speaker: Jord
2.text: I take no responsibility for your plants. You know I'm more of a mushroom man.
2.context: NodeContext: Well meant potshot at his mother, no malice in it

4.speaker: Jaheira
4.text: You've let my study turn into a thicket, is this what I am hearing?
4.context: NodeContext: Well meant potshot at his mother, no malice in it

0.speaker: Jord
0.text: I tended to it. I just let it... thrive in its own independence. You know, same way you raised us.
0.context: NodeContext: Well meant potshot at his mother, no malice in it

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: I raised you to be a sweet and kind boy. What happened?
3.context: NodeContext: Amused, gently mocking his mother

1.speaker: Jord
1.text: I watched what you did instead of listening to what you said.
1.context: NodeContext: Amused, gently mocking his mother
